* doc: Added documentation for shell completions extensions

* refactor(logging): enhance observability with comprehensive logging and documentation

- Add log_info, log_warn, log_error methods and macros
- Replace unwrap/expect with proper error propagation throughout codebase
- Add extensive logging for config, process, and SSH lifecycle events
- Implement comprehensive documentation for all modules and functions
- Add named threads and improve log formatting with consistent timestamps
- Fix logging initialization to capture initial config load

* chore: cleanup of emojis

* refactor: improve code quality, error handling, and performance

- Remove duplicate logging initialization in main.rs
- Replace .expect() with proper error handling in config loader
- Add validation for hex color codes and regex compilation
- Optimize ANSI regex compilation using lazy static in SSH logger
- Improve path handling to support non-UTF8 paths in config watcher
- Add defensive logging for index mapping fallback cases in highlighter
- Optimize String capacity allocation for ANSI sequences in highlighter
- Improve hostname extraction using idiomatic .last() method
- Add PID to process error messages for better debugging
- Fix CLI arg flag: change SSH logging from -L to -l for consistency

BREAKING CHANGE: SSH logging flag changed from -L to -l

* feat(config): add profile support

* fix(logging): detect ssh hostname from arguments regardless of position

doc(shell-completion): add sshpass usage information

* doc(main.rs): Fixed code comments for hostname extraction

* fix(highlighter.rs): Fixed index mapping boundary bug in highlighter

* fix(log/ssh.rs): Logic error in SSH logger character filter

* fix(lmacros): fixed logger instance being created on every macro call

* fix(highlighter): rremoved unused variable 'filtered_matches'

* fix(process): Fixed rules being cloned on every chunk

* fix(log/ssh.rs): Fixed issue with ssh log file being repeatedly opened

* refactor: improved logging and code quality

* refactor: improve config access safety and secret redaction performance

* feat: Added support for windows,  macOS (beta), and linux.

* doc(README): Updated main readme to match everything that is new with v0.5

* fix: Fixed all cargo clippy errors

* doc(arg): Adjusted help page command examples
